Thanks and best wishes m Call for Papers Behavioural Science & Policy 21\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd23 April 2015 University of Nottingham, Nottingham, United Kingdom The Network for Integrated Behavioural Science (NIBS) is hosting an international and interdisciplinary conference on behavioural science and policy. Behavioural science is a flourishing and growing field that is offering novel and important insights into individual and social decision making. Behavioural scientists are also incorporating their insights into social and political discourse to design more effective and behaviourally [...] Wandi Bruine de Bruin 2014-12-24T11:10:21-08:00
